SELECT REPLACE(sgg_nm, CONCAT(sd_nm, ' '), '') AS sgg_nm, sgg_cd, ST_AsText(ST_Transform(ST_Centroid(geom), 4326)) AS geom FROM tl_sgg WHERE sgg_nm LIKE CONCAT(#{sido}, '%')
SELECT DISTINCT b.bjd_nm, b.bjd_cd, ST_AsText(ST_Transform(ST_Centroid(b.geom), 4326)) AS geom FROM tl_bjd b JOIN tl_sgg c ON b.sgg_cd = c.sgg_cd WHERE c.sgg_cd = #{sgg};
